<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dream May](/Feats.aspx?ID=4532) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=212" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 77 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You are the child of a cuckoo hag, making one of your eyes violet or even black. Your mother’s powers over sleep and dreams have given you a degree of resistance to those effects, granting you a +2 circumstance bonus to all saving throws against [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145) effects and effects that cause or alter dreams. In addition, sleep is more restorative for you. You regain HP equal to your Constitution modifier × double your level (instead of just × your level), and you reduce any [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) and [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) conditions you have by 2 instead of by 1.
name: Dream May
